ingredients: 4 to 8 soft corn tortillas, warmed in the microwave or in a foil-wrapped pouch in the oven or toaster oven
1 1/2 ounces picked roast turkey meat per tortilla
1/4 cup homemade or store-bought mole poblano per tortilla (see note above)
1 tablespoon Mexican-style crema per tortilla (see note above)
Chopped fresh cilantro leaves for serving
